data.name: Vainly
data.detailed_description:
Vainly follows the story of Blue, who has been imprisoned in a prison box by three bastards for an unknown reason. But suddenly, the door opens and now the only thing it wants is vengeance.

Help it to exit the Prison Building, kill the culprits, and explore the bleak locations outside the prison.

Key Features:


  • 5 bleak levels
  • Engaging boss fights
  • Melancholic soundtracks
  • With no dialogue
  • Secrets and hidden collectables
